row.name: KST.JOBS.WIN.CXL.TOTEM.CURL_DOWNLOAD_RESULTS
row.description: Download results from Totem after they analyze the data

row._Procedure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-15" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE Content [
]>
<Content>Contact: Andrew Doig</br>
Business User: Simon Ross</br>
Any issues with this job you can't resolve, contact Andrew Doig or Judi Hayashi</br>
</br>
CXL Totem is used to validate/analyze CXL trader call data by an outside vendor, Totem.</br>
If it fails, check the report for the error, if a file was downloaded check the contents of the file for the error.</br>
If you run the curl command 2 or 3 times with error it will lock the account. This will be noted in the download file</br>
If the account is locked, email the vendor to unlock the account be sure to supply the account name which is in the curl command.</br>
You can run the line 9 command that will do a dir on the FTP site to verify it is access the site.</br>
</br>
Totem support:MK-TotemOperations@ihsmarkit.com;Douglas.Crawford@ihsmarkit.com</br></Content>

row.process:
:INC KST.JOBI.JOBS.PROCESS.GLOBAL,nofound=ignore
!:PRINT "api call with previous day | https://totem.markit.com/api/unified/daily/COM/PG/results/csv/&PREVDAY#" !:PRINT "Drop file location using previous day | \\gva0ms01\Totem\Results\80010_DD_&PREVDAY_YMD#_COM_PG_RESULTS_40.csv"
!curl -k -F username=kstappsysnot@kochind.com -F password=P_sswrd123 https://totem.markit.com/api/unified/daily/COM/PG/results/csv/&PREVDAY# > "\\gva0ms01\Totem\Results\80010_DD_&PREVDATE_YMD#_COM_PG_RESULTS_40.csv" !curl -k -F username=kstappsysnot@kochind.com -F password=P_sswrd123 https://totem.markit.com/api/unified/daily/COM/PG/results/csv/&PREVDAY# > "d:\data\cxlTotem\Results\80010_DD_&PREVDATE_YMD#_COM_PG_RESULTS_40.csv" curl -k -F username=kstappsysnot@kochind.com -F password=P_sswrd123 https://totem.markit.com/api/unified/daily/COM/PG/results/csv/2020-08-06 > "\\gva0ms01\Totem\Results\80010_DD_20200806_COM_PG_RESULTS_40.csv"
set retcode=%errorlevel% if NOT %retcode% == 0 set errorlevel=1
